headline: What Analysts Think Gives Datadog (DDOG) An Edge As The Story Starts To Shift
summary: Datadog's fair value estimate has been trimmed slightly from about US$211.97 to about US$208.49 per share, even as its modeled revenue growth rate of roughly 21.47% to 21.46% stays effectively unchanged. This small reset reflects a modest uptick in the discount rate from about 8.47% to about 8.50%, as analysts weigh strong Q3 execution and AI driven demand against fresh concerns on competition, pricing pressure after the Palo Alto Networks and Chronosphere news, and a broader reset in market...
